songs.title: Nothing Even Matters (Live)
songs.lyrics:
Intro: All
(Eh!)
'Cause the world stops when I put my arms around ya, around ya. (oh woah)
And nothing even matters (eh) (ey-eh)
And nothing even matters (eh)

[Verse 1: Logan]
It's like one for the haters
An' two for all of those who try to shut us down
They don't really know
There ain't nothing they can do that can tear us apart
No, I don't care about the money, don't care about the clothes
When we're together, baby, anything goes
We don't even need to prove what we feel in our hearts, no

[Pre-Chorus: Kendall]
This wall we built together, there ain't no way of knocking it over
We'll be here forever, getting closer, and closer baby

[Chorus]
'Cause the world stops when I put my arms around ya, around ya (oh woah)
And nothing even matters (eh) (ey-eh)
And nothing even matters (eh)
They can all talk, say what they want about us, about us (oh woah)
And nothing even matters (eh) (woah)
And nothing even matters (eh)

[Verse 2: Logan]
It's like the sound goes off and the people all freeze

They disappear and it's just you and me
Anything you want to do, anything that you please, oh woah no
Forget about our problems, forget about our past
I've seen the future and I know we're gonna last
Every second I'm with you just goes so fast, woah oh woah

[Pre-Chorus: Kendall]
This wall we built together, there ain't no way of knocking it over
We'll be here forever, thought I told ya, thought I told ya baby 'cause

[Chorus: All]
'Cause the world stops when I put my arms around ya, around ya (oh woah)
And nothing even matters (eh) (ey-eh)
And nothing even matters (eh)
They can all talk, say what they want about us, about us (oh woah)
And nothing even matters (eh) (woah)
And nothing even matters (eh)
Sing with me

[Bridge: James, (Kendall) and {Carlos}]
(Nothing even matters, woah)
(And nothing even matters)
Oh-oh, we don't even need to fight {need to fight}
Everything will be alright {oh yea}
Nothing even matters, but you and I (but you and I)

[Chorus: All]
'Cause the world stops when I put my arms around ya, around ya (oh woah) (oh)
And nothing even matters (nothin' even matters) (ey-eh)
And nothing even matters (woah-yea)
They can all talk, say what they want about us, about us (say what they want, oh woah)
And nothing even matters (eh) (woah)
And nothing even matters (eh)
'Cause the world stops when I put my arms around ya, around ya (They can take my money, take my cars, oh woah) (oh)
And nothing even matters (eh) (Nothin' even matters) (ey-eh)
And nothing even matters (eh) (baby)
They can all talk, say what they want about us, about us (oh) (oh woah)
And nothing even matters (eh) (woah)
And nothing even matters (eh)
